channel.title: Back from the dead again - DIVINITY IN DARKNESS(l3etascape)
channel.description:
So I'm back again... for those of you that know already what Divinity In Darkness was to become, or l3etascape was then you already know me as l3etal3lade, I lost my password... for those who don't, I was one of the original coders of rsps, when rsps came out working with AWSOME PEOPLE SUCH AS:
Phate, Miss. Silabsoft, Xerox, and many more people including shout outs to winterlove for getting me interested in RSPS DEV And JAVA after 8 ish years of not coding servers I am back.
I have recently reboxed my old external hardrive and got it working again I found my old source codes for Divinity in Darkness and l3etascape, also a blank original untouched winterlove source and rsc source among a treasure trove of 233GB/500GB Data worth of servers/ clients for misc games, bots, hacks, things from highschool, pictures, many things it was like a time capsule that you would dig up in a sense. I have gifts I will be spreading to people possibly in the coming future once I verify the old sources are working and untouched I have a huge amount of files from many games and noes to sort through.
LONG STORY SHORT = DIVINITY IN DARKNESS WAS A COLLABORATION WITH MANY SERVER OWNERS AND THEIR GATHERING OF PROJECTS OF THAT TIME BEAR THAT IN MIND THIS ENTIRE TIME.
I had a goal of making a server that was much more advanced then, I had/have in place a source code that has magic spells that will work based off of KARMA and that Karma is a player bound stat, the idea was to also map regions and towns and certain areas were a hot spot for good or evil players, npcs, and shop owners would react to you differently based of choices you made. Which means choices were made in quests based of the morality of who you wanted to build into you characters file.
I had made the server loop to read files so I could add quest dialogue and edit parts of the server without restarting also so this too I will be working on.
I believe if Miss. Silab and I had continued down the path we were going on coding together without servers possibly if Divinity In Darkness or as some had known it as Project Zero , may have been one of the top rated servers still running but I had issues in life and now am an adult and interested in coding again looking for a team of coder who we can all teach a little bit too each other, I have a base model already I as planning to use as a redev for my plan. I WANT A SERVER THAT EMULATES A REAL WORLD ALSO, RS HAS ALL THE ABILITY TO DO SO, MY, servers also progressed in time of day to night fall, and also I was offering seasonal value with the snow sometimes, so I wan't to create a realer vibe to a game. Are any Devs up to the challenege of this proposal? I want to make a server with changing weather globally in different areas like the world (EX: Varrock maybe has snow but ardy is beautiful) those random things I am a developer that like to add random bits of mystique...
Things I add as a dev are to deepen the game usually. Emotionally and drawn the user in. I want to Make a RSPS have real life events, and karmic records basically i have the source codes of servers that already have it implemented from years ago but I'd like to get help translating my work into the newer server sources.
THIS HAS HUGE GROWTH POTENTIAL. PLEASE HELP ME START THE NEXT BEST SERVER DEV TEAM.

item.title: Back from the dead again - DIVINITY IN DARKNESS(l3etascape)
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Death Style:

I remb goofing around a source I was using and finding the frame for objects do I get cred too

Lol

Read full topic

item.title: Back from the dead again - DIVINITY IN DARKNESS(l3etascape)
item.dc:creator: @TOXSIN TOXSIN
item.description:
@TOXSIN wrote:

tyb97:

So basically Ms. Silab was gracious enough to let you on as a nooby developer 8 years ago, which caused you to rage quit, learn nothing, then comeback and act cool?

I think you know nothing of who I am… :palm: I worked very closesly with Silab on this project… and I was a main person who got objects working in servers. Ask silab herself. or simply google search the some keywords I’ve posted.

Read full topic
item.source: Back from the dead again - DIVINITY IN DARKNESS(l3etascape)

item.title: Back from the dead again - DIVINITY IN DARKNESS(l3etascape)
item.dc:creator: @TOXSIN TOXSIN
item.description:
@TOXSIN wrote:

The password from the account got locked and changed multiple times. and I think I changed the email… so I want able to get the password back. :palm: and since all of this was so old the email I used for this site to recover passwords actually was a deleted email, because of inactivity… , my facebook tells me that my email is invalid for the same reason all the time.

Read full topic
item.source: Back from the dead again - DIVINITY IN DARKNESS(l3etascape)

item.title: Back from the dead again - DIVINITY IN DARKNESS(l3etascape)
item.dc:creator: @TOXSIN TOXSIN
item.description:
@TOXSIN wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:2, topic:546348”]nobody remembers your server

p.s your choice in names is god awful and i feel bad for whatever offspring that gets named by you[/quote]

Wow… is this forum really down to assholes nowadays? what is this? I though this is a if I’m not interested say nothing and walk away thread, guess not we got Internet tough guys trying to make people feel bad.
Your name truly suits you by the way sir, thanks for your time.

Read full topic
